entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 10:54 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow or freezing rain near noon. Fog patches. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
